Sidealterator¶

class createcloth.verbesserer.class_side_alterator.sidealterator(alterator_left, leftstartindex: int, alterator_right, rightstartindex: int)¶

Alterator to alterate bth sides at the same time. Giuven a line number the alterator will look if it can alterate given strickgraph at this line Strickgraphs are not limitied to maximal size. There should be a limit of minimal width :todo: minimal width :todo: replace_in_graph, fromxml, toxml :ivar alterator_left: :ivar leftstartindex: :ivar alterator_right: :ivar rightstartindex:
